column4: I've Ubuntu 7.10 installed and from today i can't playback any audio files (movies or mp3) . Have any one of you had problems with updates during the last days?
open up a terminal and type this:  cat /dev/urandom > /dev/dsp   do you hear static from your speakers/headphones?
how many cards are listed if you type this:  cat /proc/asound/cards
how many results from this:  ls /dev/dsp*
and try it as root too, use this:  sudo -i
okay, what do you usually use to listen to music with?
and thanks for baring with me, i want to make sure we have the bases covered :)
Yes , config is empty ! config gui  full of things
ok good - try this:  mplayer -ao alsa some_video_file.avi
